# metadata

**Instance Property**

The metadata associated with the deleted object.

## Declaration

```swift
var metadata: [String : Any]? { get }
```

## Discussion

The system only copies the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKMetadataKeySyncIdentifier] and [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKMetadataKeySyncVersion] keys from the original object. All other metadata is lost.

For more information about the metadata’s format and content, see the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKObject] class’s  [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKObject/metadata] property.

## Identifying Deleted Objects

- **uuid**: The universally unique identifier (UUID) for the HealthKit object that was deleted from the store.
